welcome.subject: Welcome to Bayit+!
welcome.title: Welcome to Bayit+
welcome.body: Thank you for joining Bayit+. We're excited to have you on board!

verification.subject: Verify Your Email
verification.title: Verify Your Email Address
verification.body: Please click the button below to verify your email address.
verification.expiry: This link will expire in {expiry_hours} hours.
verification.security: If you didn't create an account, you can safely ignore this email.

verification_resend.subject: Email Verification (Resent)
verification_resend.title: Verify Your Email Address
verification_resend.body: Here's a new verification link as requested.

password_reset.subject: Reset Your Password
password_reset.title: Reset Your Password
password_reset.body: We received a request to reset your password. Click the button below to create a new password.
password_reset.expiry: This link will expire in {expiry_hours} hours.
password_reset.security: If you didn't request this, your account is still safe. You can ignore this email.

password_changed.subject: Password Changed
password_changed.title: Your Password Has Been Changed
password_changed.security: If you didn't make this change, please contact support immediately.

account_locked.subject: Account Locked
account_locked.title: Your Account Has Been Locked
account_locked.body: Your account has been temporarily locked due to security concerns.

beta_invitation.subject: You're Invited to Bayit+ Beta!
beta_invitation.title: You're Invited to the Beta Program
beta_invitation.body: Congratulations! You've been selected for the exclusive Bayit+ Beta 500 program.

beta_welcome.subject: Welcome to Bayit+ Beta!
beta_welcome.title: Welcome to the Beta Program
beta_welcome.body: You're now part of the exclusive Bayit+ Beta 500 community!

payment_confirmation.subject: Payment Confirmation
payment_confirmation.title: Payment Received
payment_confirmation.body: Your payment has been processed successfully.

subscription_activated.subject: Subscription Activated
subscription_activated.title: Your Subscription is Active
subscription_activated.body: Your subscription has been activated. Here's what you get:

subscription_cancelled.subject: Subscription Cancelled
subscription_cancelled.title: Subscription Cancelled
subscription_cancelled.body: Your subscription has been cancelled. You'll continue to have access until {access_until}.

payment_failed.subject: Payment Failed
payment_failed.title: Payment Failed
payment_failed.body: We were unable to process your payment. Please update your payment method.

trial_expiring.subject: Your Trial is Expiring Soon
trial_expiring.title: Trial Ending in {days_remaining} Days
trial_expiring.body: Your free trial is expiring soon. Upgrade now to keep enjoying all features.

support.created_body: Your support ticket has been created. We'll get back to you soon.
support.resolved_body: Your support ticket has been resolved.

gdpr.deletion_body: As requested, your personal data has been permanently deleted.

reengagement.subject: We Miss You!
reengagement.title: It's Been a While
reengagement.body: We noticed you haven't visited in {days_inactive} days. Here's what you've been missing:
